snippet: Known as “the Jewish terrorist,” Yaakov (Jack) Teitel was also convicted of other crimes, including bombings in 2008 that wounded a leftist Israeli professor.
abstract: Israeli court convicts American immigrant Yaakov Teitel of killing two Palestinians in 1997, as well as other crimes, including bombings in 2008 that wounded leftist Israeli professor and teenage boy.
lead_paragraph: Known as “the Jewish terrorist,” Yaakov (Jack) Teitel was also convicted of other crimes, including bombings in 2008 that wounded a leftist Israeli professor.

headline.main: Israel: U.S. Immigrant Convicted in Palestinian Deaths
headline.print_headline: Israel: U.S. Immigrant Convicted in Palestinian Deaths
